text: Pride is and unincorporated community in Colbert County, Alabama. ==History== Variant names were "Prides" and "Prides Station". A post office called Pride's Station was established in 1870, and remained in operation until 1915. The origin of the name "Pride" is obscure. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Colbert County, Alabama Category:Unincorporated communities in Alabama
title: Pride, Alabama
